description: Search characters, episodes, and locations from The Simpsons by name and get detailed results. Browse paginated lists or fetch specific items by ID. Construct shareable image URLs for Simpsons assets.

capabilities.name: simpsons_search_character_by_name
capabilities.description: Searches for a character by name and returns their detailed information.

capabilities.name: simpsons_search_episode_by_name
capabilities.description: Searches for an episode by its title and returns detailed information.

capabilities.name: simpsons_search_location_by_name
capabilities.description: Searches for a location by its name and returns detailed information.

capabilities.name: simpsons_get_character_by_id
capabilities.description: Gets detailed information for a specific character by their unique ID.

capabilities.name: simpsons_get_episode_by_id
capabilities.description: Gets detailed information for a specific episode by its unique ID.

capabilities.name: simpsons_get_location_by_id
capabilities.description: Gets detailed information for a specific location by its unique ID.

capabilities.name: simpsons_get_image_url
capabilities.description: Constructs the full CDN URL for a Simpsons image.
